summary:
- Post-Processing File for ENB (enbeffect.fx FILE)
- A new developed self-acting system brings you a new ENB-Experience
- For ENB-Config-Preset Developers
- Plug & Play (just copy and tweak your ENB)
descriptionHtml:
------------------------------------------
  UPDATE Version 2.0 with GUI
  ------------------------------------------
  Tweakable Variable in GUI
  for ENB V0.198 and up

  ------------------------------------------
  WHAT IS IT?
  ------------------------------------------
       NXS-PostProcess is a 
          - enbeffect.fx -
             file for ENB
   
  ------------------------------------------
  HOW TO INSTALL?
  ------------------------------------------
  copy the file enbeffect.fx 
  to your Skyrim-Folder

  overcopy the orginal ENB 
  enbeffect.fx file

  done!  

  ------------------------------------------
              HOW TO USE IT?
  ------------------------------------------
                Turn ON 
            - Enable Adaption - 
                  in ENB
  (it does not work without it!!!)

start with a (clean) default
- enbseries.ini -
file and tweak it

  -----------------------------------------------------------------
  WHAT IS THE SPECIAL ABOUT NXS-PostProcess?
  -----------------------------------------------------------------
  it´s automatic
  it´s plug & play (just copy and tweak the ENB)
  it is reacting intelligent to your ENB tweaks
  you can create a new ENB-Style
  
  ------------------------------------------
  CAN I TWEAK THE CODE?
  ------------------------------------------
  it´s my own developed HLSL code
  it´s very well documented
  so, perhaps you are able to tweak it
  
  
  ------------------------------------------
  PERMISSION
  ------------------------------------------
  use my file to build your own
  ENB-Config-Preset.
  
  PLEASE credit NXS-PostProcess if you
  use it in your own ENB-Config-Preset
  THANK YOU!


/////////////////
included CODE:
/////////////////

Dynamic-Brightness-Range-Expansion 
- code by nexstac -

Smooth-Dynamic-Contrast-Expansion
- code by nexstac -

Smooth-Dynamic-Brightness-Coloring-Filter
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-Desaturating-Brightness
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-Detailed-Lightness
- code by nexstac -

Smooth-Dynamic-Color-Filter
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-Color-Filter
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-Color-Grading
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-HSV-Saturation
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-HSV-Value
- code by nexstac -

Dynamic-Contrast-Filter
- code by nexstac -

Reversed-Shadow-Luminance (RSLum)
- code by nexstac -

RGBpercent
- code by nexstac -

Tonemapping
- math by Greg Ward -
- code converted to HLSL by kermles -
- code modified by nexstac -

RGB-HSV-Converter
- code by Ian Taylor -


##############################################
SPECIAL THANX for FRIENDSHIP :D
- Aiyeen -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35823//?
- kermles -   http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33593/?
